author: jvanzyl
msg: - resolve the sqldbmap properly using project.resolveFile(file) so that
the datamodel task can be called via <ant> in another build file
and not kak.

author: dlr
msg: Used consistant naming convention.

author: dlr
msg: Previously ("...on LA Law"), indexOf() was used to find the last dot
in the file name when lastIndexOf() should've been instead.  This
caused problems when the directory structure for the full path to a
XML schema contained a dot, because a call to substring() would have a
larger first arg than second:
/usr/src/apache.org/jakarta/jakarta-turbine-fulcrum/turbine-schema.xml
I refactored this AppData naming code to be more forgiving of mad
hatter directory structures, and consolidated the two places it was
used into a single method.  In the case of total failure of our
algorithm, we now supply a default AppDat name of "data-model".

author: dlr
msg: it gives me nightmares sometimes

author: dlr
msg: o Calls to close() should always be in try/finally blocks, wrapped w/
a test for null.
o Interfaces should always be used to reference implementations
(i.e. use the List interface to reference Vector).
o Meaningful variable names are a nice plus.
